roleset.name: convince to join

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Hours after the announcement, representatives of the Orange County Register were in a bar across the street recruiting.
example.arg: representatives of the Orange County Register

example.name: transitive
example.text: The dispute has hampered the administration's efforts to recruit prominent doctors to fill prestigious posts at the helm of the NIH and the Centers for Disease Control.
example.arg: prominent doctors to fill prestigious posts at the helm of the NIH and the Centers for Disease Control.

example.name: transitive: PP variant
example.text: In recent months, California's Transportation Department has been recruiting in Pennsylvania, Arizona and Texas for engineers experienced in road and bridge design.
example.arg: for engineers experienced in road and bridge design.

example.name: job as infinitive
example.text: Not included on the most-likely-successor list are Joni Evans, recruited two years ago to be publisher of adult trade books for Random House, and Sonny Mehta, president of the prestigious Alfred A. Knopf unit.
example.arg: to be publisher of adult trade books for Random House,

example.name: job as as-phrase
example.text: He had worked with Mr. McDonough on an earlier project and recruited him as architect for the trade center.
example.arg: as architect for the trade center.

example.name: all args
example.text: ``The big word around Specialized is passion,'' says Erik Eidsmo, a former ski-industry executive whom-1 Mr. Sinyard recruited *trace*-1 from Citicorp to run marketing and sales.

example.name: medical sense
example.text: HIF1g induces the recruitment of bone marrow-derived vascular modulatory cells
example.arg: of bone marrow-derived vascular modulatory cells

example.name: with arg 2
example.text: The school's desperate recruitment of new teachers as department heads

roleset.note: RECRUIT-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls hire-13.5.3, orphan-29.7. (from recruit.01-v)
RECRUITMENT-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to recruit.01. Recruit.01 is a member of VN classes hire-13.5.3 and orphan-29.7. Framed by Katie. (from recruitment.01-n)
